info.title: GMO Sign
info.description: GMO Sign Connector helps organizations connect and automate how they prepare, sign, act on, and manage agreements.

post.description: Triggers a new flow when an envelope status changes.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, send an envelope.

post.summary: Register an envelope document for huge size
Send a new envelope using a specified template
post.description: Send a new envelope using a specified template.

document.description: Files got from SharePoint or OneDrive.

file_path.description: File path after "/input/" of the file name on the SFTP server. In AWS S3, the configuration is "s3://(bucket name)/(user name)/input/(file name)".

our_signer_list.description: Either one of the following must be filled in "In house signer list", "Partner signer list".

in_house_signer_envelope_documents_list.description: If you enter In house signer list, it is required.
in_house_signer_envelope_documents_list.x-ms-summary: In house signer envelope documents list

partner_signer_list.description: Either one of the following must be filled in "In house signer list", "Partner signer list".

partner_signer_document_list.description: If you enter Partner signer document list, it is required.

order_no.description: If you enter In house signer list, it is required.

sign_type.description: If you enter In house signer list, it is required.

email.description: If you enter In house signer list, it is required.

access_code.description: If you set sign_type "Contract seal type", it is optional.

is_signer_change.description: If you set sign_type "Contract seal type", it is optional.

is_attached_file.description: It is available only when you have signed up for the "Image attachment option" and it is optional.

is_drivers_license_format_check_use.description: It is available and optional only when you have signed up for the "Image attachment option" and set for Sign type "Contract seal type". It cannot be specified per document. It  cannot be combined use with Signer change and if you set for Request type "Document check, Not send".

language.description: If you do not enter this, apply the language set for the source account.

sign_type.description: If you enter Partner signer list, it is required.

name.description: If you enter Partner signer list, it is required.

email.description: Either your Email address or Phone number (it is possible if you use the SMS sending option) is required.

phone_number.description: Either your Email address or Phone number (it is possible if you use the SMS sending option) is required.

attendant_email.description: If you set Sign type "Signature in person", it is required.

access_code.description: If you set Sign type " Signature in person, Contract seal type", it is designatable.

is_attached_file.description: It is available only when you have signed up for the "Image attachment option". If there is a specification in document units, it takes precedence. (If you set Sign type " Signature in person" and Request type "Document check", it is regarded "1".)

is_drivers_license_format_check_use.description: It is available and optional only when you have signed up for the "Image attachment option" and set for Sign type "Contract seal type". It cannot be specified per document. It  cannot be combined use with Signer change and if you set for Request type "Document check, Not send".

language.description: If you do not enter this, apply the language set for the source account.

payment_type.description: It is available only when you have signed up for the "payment option" and it is optional.

amount.description: If you set Payment type " Each time, Regularly", it is required.

subscription_start_year.description: If you set Payment type "Regularly", it is required.

subscription_start_month.description: If you set Payment type "Regularly", it is required.

subscription_sale_date.description: If you set Payment type "Regularly", it is required.

order_no.description: If you designate an approver, it is required.

name.description: If you designate an approver, it is required.

email.description: If you designate an approver, it is required.

name.description: If you designate an recipient, it is required.

email.description: If you designate an recipient, either your email address or SMS phone number (it is possible if you use the SMS sending option) is required.

phone_number.description: If you designate an recipient, either your email address or SMS phone number (it is possible if you use the SMS sending option) is required.

language.description: If you do not enter this, apply the language set for the source account.

fill_text_point_start_x.description: If you enter Fill text, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed.

fill_text_point_start_y.description: If you enter Fill text, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed.

fill_text_point_end_x.description: If you enter Fill text, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed.

fill_text_point_end_y.description: If you enter Fill text, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed.

page_no.description: If you enter Fill text, it is required.

fill_text.description: If you enter Fill text, it is required.

date_text_point_start_x.description: If you enter Date text, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed.

date_text_point_start_y.description: If you enter Date text, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed.

date_text_point_end_x.description: If you enter Date text, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed.

date_text_point_end_y.description: If you enter Date text, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed.

page_no.description: If you enter Date text, it is required.

date_text.description: If you enter Date text, it is required. It is needed to enter in "YYYYmmdd" format.

check_box_point_start_x.description: If you enter Check box, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed.

check_box_point_start_y.description: If you enter Check box, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed.

check_box_point_end_x.description: If you enter Check box, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed

check_box_point_end_y.description: If you enter Check box, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed

page_no.description: If you enter Check box, it is required.

signer_no.description: If you enter In house signer envelope documents list, it is required and enter the same text that Email of this and the corresponding In house signer.

document_code.description: If you enter In house signer envelope documents list, it is required.

request_type.description: If you enter In house signer envelope documents list, it is required.

signer_no.description: If you enter Partner signer document list, it is required and enter the same text that Email or Phone number of this and the corresponding Partner signer.

document_code.description: If you enter Partner signer document list, it is required

request_type.description: If you enter Partner signer document list, it is required

signing_point_start_x.description: If you enter Signing points, it is required and only integers from 0-100 are allowed

is_compliation_mail.description: send a completion notification email to the sender

is_web_hook.description: Fire a PowerAutomate trigger on signature completion

use_template.description: Whether to use the signer registered in the template

is_attached_file.description: Allow signer to attach a sign image?

is_send_mail.description: Send a signature request email to the signer
